summary: Published in Paris in 1954, The Story of O was an immediate bestseller and literary scandal: an elegantly written S&M fantasy that had all the hallmarks of being an autobiographical account... See full summary »
cast: Dominique Aury|Cyril Corral|Thierry de Carbonnières|John de St. Jorre|Catherine Mouchet|Pénélope Puymirat|Alain Rimoux|Barney Rosset
title: Écrivain d'O
